creator: lmarlow@yahoo.com
text:
Besides being able to checkout from the tip or from a label, it would be great 
to be able to perform checkouts based on a date and time.  This would be very 
useful when used in a continuous integration process like the one provided by 
Cruisecontrol.

creator: scohen@apache.org
text:
This is the same request as in 20578.  I am going to take a whack at that.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 20578 ***
